page.name: xaf/skins
page.summary: XAF separates form/report presentation from form/report design and logic by automatically creating all HTML and DHTML in user-defined "skin" objects. The skins perform all drawing operations while the report/form objects manage all of the fields and validation. One immediate benefit of skins is the ability to design and describe a dialog once and exectute it on mobile, small form- factors (handhelds), notebooks, and desktops or to different formats like PDFs, comma-separated, and tab-delimited.
